评论详情: I'm delighted to share my experience with the 3 Pack Capri Leggings for Women, especially when my wife wears them. Let me start by saying, WOW! These leggings are an absolute game-changer when it comes to style, comfort, and versatility.  First and foremost, the fit is simply impeccable. The stretchy fabric hugs my wife's curves in all the right places, accentuating her figure beautifully. Whether she's running errands, hitting the gym, or lounging around the house, these leggings offer the perfect blend of support and flexibility.  Not only do they look fantastic, but they also feel incredibly comfortable. The soft, breathable material keeps my wife feeling cool and comfortable all day long, even during intense workouts. Plus, the high-quality construction means they hold up well wash after wash, maintaining their shape and color with ease.  What really sets these leggings apart, though, is their versatility. The three-pack offers a variety of colors and styles to suit any occasion or mood. Whether she's pairing them with a casual tee for a laid-back look or dressing them up with a stylish top for a night out, these leggings effortlessly transition from day to night.  Overall, I can't say enough good things about the 3 Pack Capri Leggings for Women. Not only do they make my wife look absolutely stunning, but they also provide unbeatable comfort and style. If you're looking for the perfect addition to your wardrobe, look no further than these leggings – you won't be disappointed!
Super soft and comfortable. Large pockets easily hold phone. Waist stays up. They’re snug but thin so not a lot of compression.

First the negative, if you can call them negative. While it says tummy control waist, I do not notice any kind of tummy control at all with these leggings. But that is fine for me, as that wasn't a feature I cared about anyway. - The pockets are mainly why I purchased these leggings. Admittedly, I did not pay a lot of attention to the photo showing the pocket placement on these leggings. All other leggings I have purchased with pockets have all had the same placement, on the side of the leg. So when I received these and found the pocket to be more on the front like regular pants I was surprised. That is my fault. These pockets are made inside of the pants with extra fabric, while the side leg pockets on other leggings I have put the pouch outside of the legging so there is no extra fabric inside. If I am explaining that correctly. So I am adjusting the fabric often as it gets bunched. The pocket is somewhat deep. It almost covers my iphone 14 plus. Walking a lot, or bending over, or other movement makes the phone move up in the pocket and at times fall out. This does not happen with the other legging pockets on the side of the leg. My entire phone fits in those and does not move when I am gardening or anything else. - I also found that I had to pull the leggings up more so they settled correctly on my waist and in the crotch area. So doing this made the leggings higher up on my leg than I wanted, unlike the photo shows. I am only 5'4" and my legs are not very long. So this was a little disappointing as well. - However, overall, I am happy enough with the purchase to not return them. The colors are very nice, the size is perfect, they are so soft, and the waist does not hurt with all day wear. If my little quirks don't bother you, then I would recommend them.

These are absolutely worth the money the material is super soft and stretchy definitely has tummy control and the quality is a 10. I've ordered these three or four times now and still have the original set they last long hold up well in the wash couldn't say more how much I love these

I really wanted to love these leggings. They are super soft and have pockets, so that’s always a plus. However, the fabric is stretchy but not tight so they’re better for yoga than weight lifting, which is what I wanted them for. They are also see through so not ideal for squatting. I’m probably going to end up using them as lounge wear around the house.
Super cute and comfy. Fit wonderful and true to size, love the deep pockets, wonderful material, keeps your warm, not see through. Will purchase again

I was a bit skeptical at first with how the sizing is labeled, this kind of combo sizing usually doesn’t fit me right at all. but these are PERFECT! keeps me cool enough at work. breathable, crazy soft, stretchier than they look, not see through and pretty high waisted. definitely getting more colors for summer. i’m 5ft roughly 140lbs give or take with fairly thick thighs (i hate when leggings are suffocating in the thighs) and the L/XL fit just right. another testament to how stretchy they are: get them and try to see how much you can fit in the pockets. it might surprise you lol. they won’t fit a whole wine bottle like popfit, but i was able to fit a Premier Protein shake, my keys, my phone and a vape in just one.

These capris are comfortable and so soft. The fit seems to be true to size. I have no issues with the length, but I’m short. I have not noticed if they are see through or not. (Didn’t see this in the comments before I purchased.) Will have to try that lately. I love that they have pockets. I bought to wear around the house and they are perfect for what I needed them for. Overall I’m happy with my purchase.
I could have sized down
Love these as they are so soft!!

I bought these back in February of 2024 and its now October 2024. I do overnight stocking so i wanted comfortable leggings with pockets. They arent tummy control like it says, but they are comfortable and they are kind of like a t shirt material. Im leaving a review now because they recently got holes in the inner thighs. I have thick thighs that rub together so, the friction caused holes. So they lasted 7-8 months but i wear them constantly.
They are stretchy, comfy and have pockets!
My daughter loves these!
Super comfy, fit great and true to size!

I love my leggings. I bought these hoping they'd be worth the price. They are cute but the fabric is super thin and not worth the price to me. I love Gym People and Oddo's leggings because the fabric has more compression and feels more expensive like they will hold up. I returned these due to the thin fabric.

I bought this set of three  and use them as lounge pants because there is absolutely no body shaping or compression in these yoga pants. They are very soft. I like the pockets although the pocket and two pockets  ripped right away when I just had a phone in it, so I had to sew it. They stay up fairly well but not the best I have  had.They are quite thin, which might be good in hot weather running errands. I personally like wearing yoga pants a little thicker when I am out in public- they look more put together. But these are good for working out or lounging around because they’re such a good price. As far as washing, they washed well. I just wish the pockets would be sewn better so they  wouldn’t rip so easily.
Workout

I am not a fan of how the pockets look when I am wearing them. They are very comfortable and do wash well though.

I bought a 3 pack of these leggings for working out and I’ve been living in them the past two weeks. So I bought more! They are super soft, nice high waist, very stretchy. I wear an 18 so I got the 2xl-3xl and they are plenty roomy but they don’t droop or sag. The only thing I wish is that the pockets were fully sewn in instead of flaps that bunch up and move around, but at least they have pockets! Again, they’re  very comfortable and I’m very happy with them.
These wash and dry beautifully over and over. They are warm under sweats but can be worn by themselves. I personally love the high waist. These are capris; product also available in full length.

Nice and lightweight and has pockets!

There's nothing wrong with these pants, it just turned out they were not exactly what I was looking for (I kept them). I was expecting them to be typical yoga pants material, they're actually cloth, and quite thick-feeling. The pockets are more like ones you'd find in regular pants/jeans, instead of the side pockets you usually find on yoga pants/leggings. No compression, not with this flexible cloth material.

This is one item I've purchased multiple times - not because they were worn and needed replacing but because I liked them so much I replaced all of my leggings. Pockets are great, fabric is not see-through at all (I got black). The fabric is also light enough its comfortable in the spring/summer, but still warm enough for fall/winter.

评论概述: Before you buy you need to know..
评论详情: They run big. I got the Lg/XL and they will fit if you are XL they are too big if you are a large. I am a large so it gets saggy in the crotch area when I walk. They do not have any tummy control what so ever. The pockets are the deal breaker for me. They are oddly placed for leggings, you can see them through the pants. I can feel the pockets on my legs 😣 sensory overload! It makes it even more awkward when you put your phone in your pocket. Definitely need a long shirt or hoodie if you intend to wear them in public. Hey! But they were affordable and they are soft. Update: I came back and added a few stars. I've worn and washed these quite a few times now. They seem to be holding up pretty well and they are still soft. They are comfortable so I'm looking to buy a 3 pack of the full leingth. The dark colors you can't see the pockets as well as you can with the grey. I wear longer shirts and that covers them pretty well. I wear these around the house and out shopping and don't feel self conscious.

These capri leggings fit like a glove. The high waisted panel prevents any slipping. I wear these with a cute top to volunteer at various activities & also at home. They stay up with no trouble. Love the colors but bought second pack to get a shade closer to burgundy. I’m happy with both packs!

The downside is that they are thin so I feel like you can kind of see more bumps and lumps through them so I don’t necessarily wear them out as much. Also, you can kind of see the inside of the pocket bunched up because they are so thin. But I’m still giving them five stars because they are really comfortable for leggings.

评论概述: Great overall, but gray was not for me
评论详情: I love the feel of these leggings! After multiple washes they are still super soft and stretchy. My number one worry about buying leggings online is if they will be see through. These ones are not, I've even worn bright pink underwear with them and nobody can tell (I asked lol). The major issue I had was that the gray one was SUPER unflattering. It showed off my cellulite and made it stand out like no other. I only wear the gray pair at home, so at least I get some use out of them. But the black and navy I wear out of the house all the time!

Even the black is slightly see-through, the gray is a little worse, but the white might as well be pantihose. The material is very thin, but it is soft. The fit is fairly true-to-size. I'd suggest sizing up so the material isn't stretched as much to reduce how see-through they are.

评论概述: Soft but the pocket is on the inside!!!
评论详情: These are super buttery soft. That’s great! They fit my 215 lb body size 16-18 and fit around my belly perfectly!! They are super soft and the pockets are pretty deep but ON THE INSIDE!!! It makes them bunch up and look ridiculous The cons are that they are not really think but they are by no means transparent. If they have spandex in them it’s not what’s most in them. I say that because they are so soft and buttery and may get picked easily if you have a pet with claws.  When I sit they bunch a little bit around the top where the pockets are. Loose like. I don’t care for that. They don’t hold you in with mulch support at all but are good for everyday around the house or casual running around. I won’t buy more. When I really like a product and know it’s gonna last I will buy more. Not these.  PS…. Cat hair DOES stick to these like crazy.  And the pocket area stretches out and bunches up and looks absolutely horrible. These are stupid ugly and I can’t send them back because the hubby threw away the packaging.

These are super soft like really soft in a good way and well sized and true to the size they should be but the waist is super high. They'd be perfect and I'd give a higher rating of the waist wasn't so high. It's too high but it didn't stop me from wearing them lol. Maybe I should try a smaller size?
